title: [K-12] Data-Driven Learning Problem Diagnosis and Personalized Instruction Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational pedagogy and basic scientific subject-matter knowledge
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers to diagnose science subject learning issues and design improvement strategies in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Analyze learners' historical assessment data to identify at least three incorrect answer patterns by key concept.
Classify learning problem types into three categories using data mining techniques and propose customized instructional strategies.
Formulate an improved teaching strategy plan suitable for the characteristics of science subjects based on diagnostic results.

resources: Web-based analytics tools accessible via smartphones
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
